title: Snake Charmer Cass
body:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2IGHRNc.jpg[/img]

day2....Cass dance is a belly dance....so why not? maybe it should be named sandstorm cass....with sand effect on her skills or maybe even a fire effects.

replies.body: Watch as Riot ignores yet again another great concept for a Cass skin. It's been **1400 (!) days** now since her last skin came out and they still have to acknowledge her existence in the slightest. But keep up the great job, it's always a joy to see new Cass artwork.
